title: City Step Classroom Leader
description:
• Introduce elementary school students in West Philadelphia to the preforming arts, as an outlet of creative self-expression.
  • Engage with the same class two times per week, building relationships and training for the final hip hop dance performance.

title: Wharton Council Committee Chair
description:
• Lead the Traditions Committee, which plans annual events that attract hundreds of students from the Wharton community.
  • Organized the Wharton 5K, a run with over 500 students that donated $7500 to Minding your Mind in 2018.
  • Organized Chillin nâ€™ Grillin, a barbeque with over 600 Penn students that hosted local musicians and caterers.
  • Organized Business of Life Lecture, a talk given by NFL star Justin Tuck, astronaut Garrett Reisman, and rapper Hoodie Allen.

title: Faith Always Wins Youth Board Director
description:
• Engaged thousands of people from Kansas City in SevenDays, an event to promote personal growth and cultural acceptance.
  • Designed an educational program, which exposed 22,000 students in the Blue Valley School District to new cultures and faiths.
  • Planned two walks to honor those lost in the 2014 Jewish Community Center hate crime. Over 6,000 people participated.
